mapper.sql: customer AS "customer",state AS "state", product_order_id AS "productOrderId", number AS "number", money AS "money", customer_id AS "customerId", create_time AS "createTime", create_user AS "createUser", update_time AS "updateTime", update_user AS "updateUser", display AS "display", deptId AS "deptId"
mapper.select:
select
from daoxin_erp_product_order where 1 = 1
and product_order_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.productOrderId},'%')
and number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.number},'%')
and money like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.money},'%')
and customer_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.customerId},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and create_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createUser},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
and update_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateUser},'%')
and display like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.display},'%')
and deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')
